website_summaries.verdict: If your youngster loves anime characters, this dragon makes a fun gift. However, it's also practical for fans of all ages since it is also a cute but handy neck cushion.
pros: Differs from other anime plush toys in that it can double as a comfortable neck cushion thanks to the coiled "U" shape
Kids find this stuffed dragon cuddly and cute
cons: A few crooked or "lopsided" dragons have been reported
Small holes along seams have been found

customer_reviews.title: Love Him!
customer_reviews.text: I love little Haku! Great investment! The pink isn't as..well pink or spread out as the picture but a little advice from a stuffed animal maker and enthusiast, If you want more pink or want to wash it and the pink washes off, just use chalk :) other than that he's perfect in every way! Super duper soft and very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Hole in stomach seam but wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: cute and comfortable but came with a hole in the seam: EDIT: after posting review talking about hole in plush they sent me a brand new one. wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.author: Guertana

customer_reviews.title: Never Wake a Sleeping Dragon
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this guy every time I go on a plane! He’s soft and cute! Perfect for the casual traveling nerd.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Not Too Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is a very cute design, and it arrived looking brand new, soft, and just like the picture. I took this pillow with my on a 17 hour flight to Singapore, and it was not comfortable at all. Maybe it was because of the duration of the flight, but the pillow brought very minimal relief. I think the main reason is that the tapered tail cuts down on the element of all around comfort, as that was sacrificed for aesthetics. If you're doing minimal traveling, at around no more than 4 hours, then this pillow would probably be fine. But for anything more, you're probably gonna want to find a better shaped neck pillow.
customer_reviews.author: M. Troll

customer_reviews.title: it is quite functional—-very soft and comfortable. As a toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a neck pillow and a toy for my daughter when we go on vacations. As a neck pillow, it is quite functional—-very soft and comfortable. As a toy, she loves it and named it Marshmallow already and had introduced it to her other stuffed dragons (she has quite the collection). She had requested a white dragon after seeing a preview for the How to Train Your Dragon movie out in December (she really wanted the white Night Fury dragon, to be honest, but I couldn’t find her one). This one will be do! Very cute
customer_reviews.author: Couch Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sewing job.
customer_reviews.text: This product should have been quality checked, as the sewing was extremely poor quality, and came out janky. Its tail and feet are sticking up and out at an odd angle when it's supposed to be laying flat. The blush coloring is also a bit slap-dash on the feet. I would suggest looking for a different selling company, as this studio Ghibli knock-off definitely isnt as nice as it is in their photo.
customer_reviews.author: Esazrael

customer_reviews.title: He's soft and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy! My son needed a good neck pillow for a flight we will be taking. He saw this and was smitten. He's actually a good size and has been a snuggle buddy for my 2 year old since. In fact, he named him Sock and can't sleep without him. He's very soft and he is super cute. I even tried him out and he works for an adult neck pillow as well. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mblmrchick

customer_reviews.title: Not quite like the pic, but still cute:
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, my order arrived with a tail that’s pointing up, not down as shown. The coloring on the cheeks isn’t remotely as pronounced as in the photo. That said, the pillow is still very cute. It’s soft and the size is generous. It arrived packaged with other items I’d ordered and was protected by a plastic bag. It’s still a charming gift for my niece who is an anime fan. For the price, I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Alli O.

customer_reviews.title: Not the original, knock off
customer_reviews.text: I have this one and one I ordered years ago. The new one is subpar and inferior to the one I bought originally. It is lumpy, sewn poorly, and the coloring is off. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jaa.1385

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a decorative pillow for by sister-in-law's nursery. She loved it and thought it was the cutest thing. It was packaged weirdly so it was bent when I first opened it, but it flattened out after laying out for a bit. She used it as a neck pillow too ❤
customer_reviews.author: Math

customer_reviews.title: Such a good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy! He's absolutely adorable and just as cute, if not cuter, than I imagined. He didn't come with a pink nose blush, but I think that's because I accidentally ordered from a different seller. REGARDLESS!! He is a good little plush and still just as cute and cuddly as any. Very comfortable for the neck, too, and so warm! I look forward to taking him everywhere with me! Sorry for the color filter and the dark lighting in the pic! It's the only one I have on hand at the moment :)
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a friend for a moomin plush and didn't really intend to use it much, but last week I got a second piercing in both my ears and haven't been able to sleep since. UNTIL THIS ARRIVED!!! It's soooo comfortable and soft and has enough support for my neck that i can sleep on my back OR sides comfortably without bothering my ears!!!!! i've also had some neck stiffness problems recently and after three nights of sleeping with this things my neck feels so much better!!! Worth every penny. Took a long time to arrive, but worth the wait!!!!!!!! plus it's super cute
customer_reviews.author: Guen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and my kiddo loves it
customer_reviews.text: He smiles so big when I hand it to him or give him kisses with it. The giggles are just too cute and you should have seen his face when I presented it to him. Well made. It's smaller than I thought it would be, though. It's perfect for my 2 year old or someone with a small neck if you're actually going to use it as a neck pillow and not just a great plushy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald and Tanya G.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, my teenage son picked this out for his younger sister’s birthday, and she wears it around her neck almost like a travel pillow. He’s a much-loved addition to the family, and everyone who has seen him has commented on how cute he is. Would definitely recommend/buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Like that it can be multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Like that it can be multipurpose...my daughters love for playing with plush dragons and be used as pillow. The details on it are more than suitable and doesn't look like a cheap job.
customer_reviews.author: NOY

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! A neck pillow in the shape of his favorite dragon from Spirited Away (a knockoff, but still great!); he mainly uses it to comfortably play games/watch movies in our swivel chair. And to top it off, it's really soft!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the cutest neck pillow I have ever seen. It makes a wonderful gift, it arrived just in time and it is exactly how it is described which I am grateful for. I might purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little dragon and it was cheap but not what you would expect because the inside is cotton and normally for this kind of pillow its memory foam but its a nice twist and its adorable!
customer_reviews.author: eme of AZ.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and I thinks it’s so so cute
customer_reviews.text: We went on a trip and I got this for my daughter to use on the plane. She loved it and I thinks it’s so so cute. My daughter loves dragons and unicorns so this pillow was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KelliAK

customer_reviews.title: Cute neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: Its adorable, though I did sew a button into the underside of the nose (and added a loop on the tail) to make sure it actually stayed around my neck. Pretty easy adjustment, for a cute neck pillow
customer_reviews.author: M. Carlyle

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Came in the mail really fast. Absolutely adorable and soft, hopefully the person I'm giving it to likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Haku!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it cute but it's very comfortable! Surprisingly good quality and a good size for both children and adults this little Haku neck pillow makes a good travel buddy :)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: The Dragon Plush of cuteness~
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this lil dragon plush, reminds me of Haku from Spirited away and its quite comfortable to have around the neck~!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa delaney

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if it would work around my neck, but it even makes the perfect neck pillow for the couch. It's very soft and looks exactly like it's pictured. I was very happy with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ingeborg Zandee

customer_reviews.title: Smeared lipstick..?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was a fluke, but mine looks like it chewed up some lipstick and fell asleep... Not exactly the cute rosy nose I was expecting, but it’s still cute and cozy. The lower body is a little twisted, but it’s not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little guy to snuggle up with on a plane or car ride. Though, I find it kind of difficult to keep on my shoulders. I have to keep adjusting it to keep the tail out of my face, but other than that, it's a really cute gift! Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DannyAtTacoBell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a photo prop and as a decoration! Haven’t actually tried it as a neck pillow yet but it’s very soft and plush so I think it’d work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The pink is not as diffuse as in the picture, as I believe someone else has said. It's a good value though, came in a timely manner, and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Madge C

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: A lil on the narrow side and especially as it tapers, but still very usable and cute... I find myself tucking the tail folded back under behind my neck as well however, but that's fine, I dont like things around the front too much anyhow
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M Seibel

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻 Teen approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for teenager. She LOVES IT! It is soft, great colors, great neck pillow size, very cute!!
customer_reviews.author: JRo

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: Adorable gift for that anime lover in your life who likes to nap and travel
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Wolfrom

customer_reviews.title: Cute and held up well when machine washed and dried on delicate.
customer_reviews.text: Cuter than expected. Very sturdy. Held up to machine washing (needed for allergies).
customer_reviews.author: Bev S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft but rips easy
customer_reviews.text: After 2 days my daughter asked me to sew it back together for her
customer_reviews.author: Jenilu

customer_reviews.title: soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: i liked that this was on of the super stretchy fabrics and not the tight or baggy fabrics i would not use for airplanes or trips the fabric warms up really quick and gets hot and sweaty
customer_reviews.author: MENGJIAO CHEN

customer_reviews.title: May not get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The one I received does not have the nose blush at all. But it is cute and I think the receiver will still like it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use this on a travel!
customer_reviews.text: i love the product! it is what was advertised! although most of the ppl around me don’t know who this is 🤪
customer_reviews.author: FlintGreene

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter who loves Animé. I was surprised it makes a great pillow rest.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceLove1969

customer_reviews.title: Soft buddy
customer_reviews.text: My brother bought this for me for my birthday but I love it i always sleep on it for a pillow and it’s just very comforting especially for travel it’s literally a neck rest and a cute friend i’d buy 100 more if i could
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loved it, I love it, my cat cuddles it. We love it
customer_reviews.author: andrew lopez

customer_reviews.title: This is the cutest little guy and i love him so much
customer_reviews.text: Kawaii Onii-chan!! This is the cutest little guy and i love him so much! The blush on his face faded away pretty quickly but he's still cute.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Grier

customer_reviews.title: River spirit
customer_reviews.text: love it, cute, comfy. Perfect for u and ur baby
customer_reviews.author: victoria Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! I travel a lot and so why not have a cute pillow to take with you, right? It is super soft and doesn't lose shape when squished against things or laid on. It isn't as thick as I thought it would be but that is okay, I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Falcore is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Falcore is awesome! He did take a long long time getting here from China and had a smell to him once he got here for awhile but he is all better now and one hell of a luck dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Maloney

customer_reviews.title: My lil dragon.
customer_reviews.text: What I can say about a cute lil dragon,.. Sit in my bed ,to be hugged or to help my neck. He does both, I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alkira

customer_reviews.title: A little off..
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was stitched in a way where the tail stays sticking up, and there's not much I'll be able to do about that.. The coloring on the face wasn't spread out and looked like very odd lipstick. Thankfully I have fabric markers and will be able to apply some more pink to fix the coloring. Overall, not the worst, but could have been a bit more on point.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a costume piece and it's really great if you want to just nap on the spot. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Valle

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but the nose isn’t pink and when I got mine he had a hole in him but he’s soft and super cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for resting your head. It is firm enough to support, but soft enough to be comfortable. The tail does kind of tickle, but it's a dragon what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Heart

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, and comfy. Very nice purchase. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter always brings her dragon for sleepovers. She loved it. Now has two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Helen  McMackin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a way to clasp it together, to keep it from sliding, but overall it's very soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter Loooooves it ! Ha! She’s 6. Well made. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. I use it as a pillow when I go on airplanes and when I sleep at night it’s super cute and really comfortable. The only problem with it is when I first got it it had a tiny hole in the horn but it was a very easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This plush is adorable and looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its good, a little hard but it will soften up. Quite adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Cutest ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. He flew with me to vegas and he will go again.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY LILJEDAHL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Freaking adorable; looks like Haku [Spirited Away]. Big and comfortable; was my teen's favorite present

customer_reviews.title: Same issues as others
customer_reviews.text: Same issues of seam warp making the tail go up, pink transfer, and odd pink placement unlike photo. Otherwise as described, (soft, comfy, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Well made plushy.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and well loved. My daughter loved it and it's held up well.
customer_reviews.author: T.A.B.

customer_reviews.title: A little bit of a color issue.
customer_reviews.text: There was some bleeding from the pink that discolored part of the dragons white. Otherwise it's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiotepup

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: came very fast, was exactly as described and so cute
customer_reviews.author: kassimer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, but within hours of receiving stitching along inside seam came undone and stuffing fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: She and the nurses all loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Meant as a gift for my mother who loves dragons, and had to go through a lengthy hospital stay after surgery. She and the nurses all loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute cute!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, extremely soft plush and not too bulky on the neck
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw it on Amazon and she said she had to have it super cute dragon plush super comfortable when she goes away my son likes to sleep with it because it reminds of her
customer_reviews.author: Juan De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this as a stuffed animal along with it being a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs, I needed a stiff neck pillow that will hold my head at a certain angle for new hair extensions. It's not squishy like others and it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awkward to use as an actual pillow sometimes, but very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything bad to say about this its cute soft and perfect :D I used it as my Haku from my Spirited Away cosplay.
customer_reviews.author: 8r19^9L33

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and cuddly!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Nice and squishy and perfect for when my neck starts to hurt. Plus the dragon is adorable!!
customer_reviews.author: Windyfan

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend and I know she is going to love it. it is so cute and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Randie Herring

customer_reviews.title: Cute as hell, not a great neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item, the only issue is it doesn't rest right around the neck. It tends to fall off. Adorable as a stuffie though so I do love it still
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Deadman

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and squishable!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't provide quite as much neck support as I hoped but this little guy makes for a great shoulder companion. Huggability is great, too! :)

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cute
customer_reviews.text: Not the most supportive if you really need your head held up, but comfy and very cute

customer_reviews.title: A cuddly friend
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wrapped it around her neck and wouldn’t take it off

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: It's great as a toy and a neck pillow. Highly recommend for traveling. Works for adults too.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft material. Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a dragon and anime loving little girl and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow!! It’s the perfect nostalgic accessory for when I’m watching anime or reading a book.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got it so my kid could sit in it. He really likes it and it is really conformable.

customer_reviews.title: Cute with a purpose
customer_reviews.text: Stitching or stuffing is off so its a bit lopsided but still pretty happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved it! Took it on her travel to Central America!

customer_reviews.title: So. Flippin. Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 7 year old, he loves it. Super adorable.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, not the most comfy
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. I bought it for long car rides.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Great neck pillow for relaxing at home or taking on a trip!

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, hoping to use it for a road trip that I am going on. But when it arrived, the body was crooked, and the stitching was messily done, i would not suggest purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned

customer_reviews.title: Did not look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I asked my daughter what she thought about her dragon. It was a little disappointing. The detail was not clear. The lines were blurry and not clear.
customer_reviews.author: Tlynn

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but it doesn't do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Not a functional neck pillow. Super cute, but doesn't fit correctly on a neck--at least not comfortably so. I sent it back and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Unasognatore

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but iffy construction
customer_reviews.text: Soft and loveable, but because of halfhearted/speedy manufacture, he coils the opposite direction on the tail (Ie. the seam twists), causing the lower half to flip upwards uncomfortably. He’s super cute, i just wish he was a flat coil, not always throwing his tail in my face.
customer_reviews.author: JaguarG

customer_reviews.title: useful for long roadtrips
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a friend, she loves it! It was bigger than expected. Very comfy and cute, useful for long roadtrips!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, both in comfort + cuteness
customer_reviews.text: Haku arrived super quickly. I've also noticed the pink patches other reviewers have mentioned, but I don't think it's that big of a deal. Perfect dragon to cuddle up with on an airplane, put me right to sleep. Pics included for height/length reference.
customer_reviews.author: JDPants

customer_reviews.title: Complement getter Travel Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift for my daughter (18) She absolutely ❤️S this. She uses it as a neck pillow and gets towns of complements when she travels with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mommy needs one too?
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft!! Bought it for my daughter who loves dragons but it would totally fit around my neck for a pillow! Definitely reminds me of Spirited Away!!

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Cute but doesyhave the pink face and the green is a dark green not the real color shown. Wouldn't rebuy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for a teenager. Super cute and soft.

customer_reviews.title: cuddly and functional
customer_reviews.text: super comfy, adorable, and easy to spot if someone tries to steal your travel pillow!

customer_reviews.title: It's so soft
customer_reviews.text: It's comfy and really soft a little too bulky for me on a plane ride but lounging on the couch with it is great.

Fullfilled by imported Thailand PP cotton filling material, which is Meets or Exceeds Product Safety Standards, Non-toxic and Non-allergic Artificial Fur.
